name: Your Kingdom
description:
The web version may not work as intended. For the best gaming experience, please download the game.

A short "city builder" made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1.

Disclaimer: The theme of death is mentioned a few times.

Become a king in your kingdom! Decide what do you think is right and what's wrong to do to achieve glory. 

This is the first-ever actual game I made. I only made very short games before, which I never even finished, but this time I decided to finish it completely and release it to the world. Although I probably chose the wrong engine for the game I wanted to make, I just went with it, so I apologize for things that may not look as good as they could.

Includes:

  • 1400+ words
  • 2+ endings
  • ~30 minutes of gameplay (depends on the style you play the game)
